---
title: "Anton Westveld - Inaugural International Partner of Ireland's Foundations of Data Science for Industry and Enterprise"
date: "03-12-2019"
categories: [news, grant]
---

The application “Centre for Research Training (CRT): Foundations of Data Science for Industry and Enterprise – FUSE”  led by Professor James Gleeson – University of Limerick, Professor Claire Gormley – University College Dublin and Professor Ken Duffy – Maynooth University was successful.

Dr. Anton Westveld and Associate Professor Grace Chiu are very excited to be inaugural international partners in the Centre, which seeks to provide cutting edge training in Data Science ([http://www.data-science.ie](http://www.data-science.ie/)).
